definition: to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy

sentences.english: This season his trigger-happy days are becoming few and far between.
sentences.chinese: 这个赛季他胡搅蛮缠的时候渐渐减少。

sentences.english: Above all I do not wish to importune or compromise you.
sentences.chinese: 总之我不希望你胡搅蛮缠或妥协。

definition: to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval
to make a scene/to fool around/to behave foolishly
to make a scene/to raise hell
to act wickedly/to bully/to make life difficult for sb by unreasonable actions
to mess around/to mess with something/to have an affair
not knowing when to come or leave (idiom); with no sense of propriety
to act arbitrarily regardless of the rules/to mess with sth/to make a hash of things/to cause trouble
to twist words and force logic (idiom)/sophistry/loud rhetoric making up for fallacious argument/shoving false arguments down people's throats
